name: BSAFE (Black Safety Access Freedom & Equity)
description: Ensuring families stay housed and fed while developing the tools to move from surviving to thriving.
fullDescription: Ensuring families stay housed and fed while developing the tools to move from surviving to thriving.
whatTheyOffer: Ensuring families stay housed and fed while developing the tools to move from surviving to thriving.
howToGetIt: For more information or to sign up, email rbabbit@btwcsc.org or call 415-928-6596.
